double white ()
 Creates white noise.
This generates one sample of white noise at full scale (maximum amplitude 1.0).

double xdsp::noise::white ( )
inline

Creates white noise.
This generates one sample of white noise at full scale (maximum amplitude 1.0).

Returns
White noise sample
